p: In order to assess the correlation between the Egyptian ecospecies as well as Pakistani [ 24], Iranian [ 23, 25], and Brazilian [ 31] ecospecies, the GC-MS data of the major compounds of the EO was subjected to PCA. The PCA horizontal axis explained 38.55% of the total variance, while the vertical axis explained a further 22.59% ( Figure 3A). It is clear that both Iranian ecospecies (Iran-Sistan and Iran-Lurestan) are significantly correlated with each other as well, and are also correlated with the Pakistani ecospecies ( Figure 3A and Table 2). However, the Egyptian ecospecies did not show any correlation with all of the other ecospecies.
